title: New: Labrador Van – Opal
body:
**Labrador Van**, a four piece from Vancouver show heaps of potential on new track, _Opal_.

A gritty two and a half minute number, drawing from the likes of **Wavves** yet with a more lovelorn attitude, it almost feels like an album opener, building the foundations for greater things to come. As the song crescendo’s in a mess of extravagant drums and scratchy guitar lines, it finishes, leaving the tantalizing feeling of forever craving more. Check out _Opal_ below.
